item.description:
4th of July jingoism got you down? Then come to our Seventh Annual

ANTI-IMPERIALIS T PICNIC

Build World Peace
Celebrate Independence for all Nations

Sunday, July 4th
noon - 4:00pm
Charles River Park, Boston (Allston)

Meet the radicals in your community, and their children, and their dogs
Sunbathe
Play Frisbee / Football / Futbol
Eat lots of great food (we will have a vegan friendly grill)
Sing radical folk songs
Have fun

Radical unity beyond Boston's May Day!
We will be there early to stake out a picnic table.
Look for our banners.

When you RSVP, please let us know if you can volunteer to bring something!

NO STARS AND STRIPES PLEASE

Sponsored by: Industrial Workers of the World - Boston Branch, Boston May Day Coalition, Mass Global Action, Socialist Party of Boston
PLEASE ASK YOUR GROUP TO CO-SPONSOR!

Directions: The Charles River Park is located off Soldiers Field Road in Allston. Take the 86 bus to Everett St. Parking and picnic tables are by the water. Here is a map: http://tinyurl.com/km9d4g
item.name: 4th of July Anti-Imperialist Picnic
